channel.title: Adding run.bat help
channel.description:
Ok i've been using eclipse to run my client but now i'm wanting to jar etc. But i'm not really good working with clients yet as i'm still learning. I'm just needing help making the run.bat so far. This is what i have so...
@echo off title Client "C:/Program Files/Java/Jre7/bin/java.exe" (What goes here??) pause
